page.shortlink: api sockets object datagram kill function
page.deprecated: The *[xb:SOCKETS]* object is deprecated and may be removed in a future release. Use *[link:INET::Socket@https://documentation.alphasoftware.com/index?search=api%20inet%20namespace%20socket%20class%20index]* instead.

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The name assigned to the handler by <SOCKETS>.DATAGRAM_HANDLER().

page.discussion: The .DATAGRAM_KILL() method closes a datagram handler.
